titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the triennial visitation of the right reverend father in God, Richard, L. Bishop of Bath and Wells held at Bridgewater, on the 19th day of August, 1695 / by Matthew Hole ...
titleStmt.author: Hole, Matthew, 1639 or 40-1730.
Kidder, Richard, 1633-1703.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, stained, and with print show-through and loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
